result.ga: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agat
result.orig: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agat
result.html: An bhfuil fios an bhealaigh agatDo you know the way?
result.ponchtml: An ḃfuil fios an ḃealaiġ agatDo you know the way?

result.eng: They don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.html: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.
result.ponchtml: Níl fios a ngnó acuThey don't understand their own business. They don't know what they are doing.

result.eng: I know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.html: Tá fios an bhealaigh agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.
result.ponchtml: Tá fios an ḃealaiġ agamI know the way, lit. I have knowledge of the way.

result.eng: If they failed, it is not known why.
result.ga: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.orig: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáth
result.html: Má theip orthu ní fios cén fáthIf they failed, it is not known why.
result.ponchtml: Má ṫeip orṫu ní fios cén fáṫIf they failed, it is not known why.

result.eng: The Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ga: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.orig: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí as
result.html: Thug an Príomh-Aire le fios do na meáin go raibh sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
result.ponchtml: Ṫug an Príoṁ-Aire le fios do na meáin go raiḃ sé ar tí éirí asThe Prime Minister announced to the media that he was about to resign.
